question.title: Can't find the Bluetooth device?
question.resolution1: 1. Make sure your Bluetooth device is not too far from your phone
question.resolution2: 2. Turn off the Bluetooth accessory and turn it back on
question.resolution3: 3. Make sure the Bluetooth accessory is on and fully charged or plugged in

team-archive.title: Are you sure you want to archive the team?
team-archive.message: Once archived, no new members can be added, and current join requests will be removed. If the team has no new activities or posts within 14 days after archiving, it will be disbanded.

{{name}}
has been added to My Routes
create-route-success.text: Leave your comment on this route so others can explore it too!

tip-info.title: What is a Team Sticky Note?
tip-info.message:
Any manager of a public team can use the Team Sticky Note feature to update the team's current status, such as announcing new activities, recruiting new members, etc. If the content is unchanged, the post will remain on the map for 7 days.

Of course, in a usage scenario that respects and embraces everyone, Team Up does not restrict the content that any team wants to publish.
tip-info.check-text: Do not show this prompt again

arrange-route.title: Draw New Route
arrange-route.ask-leave: Are you sure you want to leave 'Draw New Route'?
arrange-route.ask-leave-tip: Exiting now will discard any unsaved progress.

nodata.title: No chat rooms available
nodata.text: It seems you haven't joined any teams or followed any riders. Explore new riders and teams, and create riding memories with others!

text.Asphalt: Asphalt roads are typically smoother and more stable, providing a comfortable and efficient riding experience. Overall, asphalt roads are ideal for long-distance or high-speed rides.
text.Gravel: Gravel roads are usually covered with small stones or gravel, requiring more skill and attention. Such surfaces also increase the risk of slipping and vehicle wear.
text.Dirt: Dirt roads can become muddy and slippery in wet or rainy conditions. Riding on dirt roads requires more balance and control, as well as dealing with potential traction changes.

route-select-report-confirm.list-title: Users have reported that this route has the following issues:
route-select-report-confirm.memo: If you still choose this route, pay attention to safety. It‚Äôs recommended to prepare an alternate plan. Enjoy your ride!

user-account.delete-confirm-title: Do you want to remove this account?
user-account.delete-confirm-msg:
After confirmation, your account will enter a 30-day archive state.
If you change your mind, you can log in during the archive period to restore it.
user-account.delete-confirm-msg2:
Continuing will place your account in an archived state,
other users will not be able to find you on TeamUp.
Archiving will continue until {{date}}.
At that time, your account will be permanently removed from the database.

Join teams you are interested in, share your experiences with others.
After all, you both love life and riding.

team.TeamTagMemo: Describe the characteristics of the team so that people can find it more easily.

so your team can be displayed clearly!

team.buildTeamSuccessInfo: Your team has been successfully created! Next, you can start inviting members, publishing posts, and share the joy of sports with everyone to create unforgettable memories!

An archived team cannot add new members.

team.cencal-archived-success-tip:
Now you can invite new members to join the team.
Enjoy!
team.main-team-tip: Start enjoying endless fun exploring outdoor sports with your partners. Challenge yourself and go beyond!

public-memo.false: Only members can see the posts, activity records, and location info
public-memo.true: Everyone can see the team's recent activities and posts

review-need-memo.true: A private team requires manager approval to join

team-edit.team-tag-tip: Set team tags so more people can find your team.

team-basearea.title: Team Base
team-basearea.set-basearea-tip: Once you set the team base, you must wait 14 days before changing it again.

team-alias-edit.Title: Title Name
team-alias-edit.ask-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this title?
team-alias-edit.ask-delete-tip: After deleting this title, members with this title will be reset to none.

post-form.edit-exit-confirm: You are about to leave the post. Unsaved content will be lost. Are you sure you want to leave?
post-form.recommend-route-title: How about sharing your recent workout experiences?

close-bluetooth-device.title: Are you sure you want to disable data display for this section?
close-bluetooth-device.message: Disabling the data display for this section will also disconnect the associated Bluetooth device. Do you wish to continue?

instant-search.not-enough-words-desc: Please enter at least 2 letters to search

chat.silence-mode: The other party has enabled silent mode and will not receive message notifications temporarily

leave-confirm.title: Are you sure you want to leave the chat group {{name}}?
leave-confirm.message: Leaving the chat group does not mean leaving the activity/team. It only indicates that you do not want to receive any messages from this group. If you wish to rejoin or reopen it later, you can do so through the activity/team‚Äôs chat button.

calorie-exchange.title: Calorie Conversion
calorie-exchange.tip-p1: Enter your biological information for more accurate calorie calculations
calorie-exchange.tip-p2: If not provided, a default value will be used
calorie-exchange.tip-p3: Don‚Äôt worry, this info is only used for calorie calculations
calorie-exchange.pop-up-subtitle: Set your biological info to get more accurate calorie data during workouts. If not set, average values are used and results are for reference only.

location-share.title: Location Sharing
location-share.share-tip: Automatically share your location, route, and real-time data with your sharing targets when riding
location-share.share-all-tip: Your profile must be 'Public'. Please go to 'Settings > Privacy' to change.
location-share.share-cycling-memo: Share your cycling data with fellow participants

route-detail.activity-slogen: Are you eager to try this route? You can also...

stopwatch.running-alert: Another activity is currently in progress. Please complete the ongoing one first.
stopwatch.move-near-meeting-point: Please move closer to the gathering point
stopwatch.wait-user-for-start: Waiting for you to start the activity...
stopwatch.wait-leader-for-start: Waiting for the organiser to start the activity...
stopwatch.location-share-to-msg: You have not set a default sharing target. Would you like to set it now?

act-user-open-share.title: Share your location with activity members
act-user-open-share.message: Location will only be shared when the activity starts and will stop after the activity ends.

share-together.title: Share the live event with the organiser
share-together.message: If the organiser enables live broadcast for the activity, you can share your workout data with the audience during the activity (depending on your settings).

activity-open-share.title: Allow live broadcast of this activity?
activity-open-share.message: Once enabled, all accepted participants will automatically share the activity live after it starts. Viewers can see detailed info and all members' locations (per user settings).

profile-share.title: Personal Activity Location Sharing
profile-share.message: According to your personal sharing settings, share your live workout once the activity starts.

unable-complete.title: Unable to complete the activity now?
unable-complete.message: The activity time and distance are too short to be completed. Please continue or restart.

complete-confirm.title: Are you sure you want to complete the activity?
complete-confirm.message: Once completed, you cannot resume. Confirm completion?

stopwatch.leader-complete-message: You are the lead rider. Completing the activity means it will be ended for everyone. Confirm complete?
stopwatch.creator-complete-message: You are the creator of the activity. Completing the activity means it will end. Confirm complete?

share-live-link.title: Would you like to share your live activity link?
share-live-link.message:
Anyone with the link can view your live activity.
To share with someone who isn‚Äôt registered on the platform, ensure the 'Share anonymous user (non-platform user)' option is enabled (it‚Äôs enabled by default).
Tap 'Go to Settings' or check it in the 'Location Sharing Settings' screen.

invite-cancel.title: Are you sure you want to leave the stopwatch?
invite-cancel.message: You have already invited riding partners. If you leave the stopwatch, the invitation will be cancelled. Are you sure you want to leave?

stopwatch-finished.delete-record-title: Are you sure you want to delete the workout record?
stopwatch-finished.delete-record-msg: Once removed, all riding data will not be retained
stopwatch-finished.Name: Workout Record Name

sport-live.close-guest: The user has disabled 'Share anonymous user (non-platform user)'!

area1.t1:
Join forces in this
new social exercise
area1.d1: Team Up is a road cycling social platform that allows cycling enthusiasts to form and manage teams, organise and participate in outdoor activities, and share the best cycling experiences.

area3.t1:
Unlock the global cycling map
You won't be alone in your workouts

area4.t1:
Team operation, cycling meetup,
all done in one place

item0.title: Build a Team
item0.desc: Organise various types of teams and activities according to your workout habits, area, and goals

item1.title: Effortless Meetup
item1.desc: No need to rely on multiple platforms for group planning. Convenient for organisers to plan meetups

area5.t1:
Ride alone, ride with pros,
or watch online

item0.title: Bike Computer
item0.desc: Use our bike computer feature to record complete riding data. You can also connect multiple sensors and freely arrange the real-time information you need

item1.title: Live Broadcast
item1.desc: Watch live rides of people you follow. Besides real-time positioning, bike computer data is also displayed in real-time‚Äîit's time to showcase your strength!

route-comment-list.title: All Comments
route-comment-list.nodata: There are no comments for this route yet

route-activity-list.title: All Activities for This Route
route-activity-list.nodata: No activities for this route yet

chat-stranger-list.memo: This is the stranger messages folder. You can view and approve messages from non-friend users here. They will not know your decision.

home-activity-invite.title: You have a new activity invitation!

delete.title: Are you sure you want to remove this post?
delete.message: Removing this post will also remove all likes and replies associated with it.

leave-team.title: Are you sure you want to leave {{teamName}}?
leave-team.message: Leaving the team will also remove you from the team‚Äôs chat channel.

team-only-manager.title: You are the only manager
team-only-manager.message: If you want to leave the team, please assign a new manager or archive the team.

block-user.title: Are you sure you want to block {{name}}?
block-user.message: Blocking will remove your follow on them, and they will be unable to follow you, view your posts, mention you, or invite you to activities or teams.

notice-message.mention-on-teampost: {{name}} mentioned you in a post in {{team}} team
notice-message.mention-on-post: {{name}} mentioned you in a post

sport-live-chat.no-follow: You are not following this user, unable to comment
